Translations.Text: my ne utvoryly vas z nyzʹko ridki
Todi my rozmistyly tse u dobre-zakhyshchenomu skladi
Protyahom spetsyfichnoho periodu
My obmiryly tse akuratno. My yavlyayemo soboyu krashchykh dyzayneriv
Prykroshchi na shcho denʹ do rejectors
my ne zrobyly zemlyu abode
Dlya zhyvyy ta mertvyy
My rozmistyly na tse vysoki hory, ta yakshcho vy z svizhoyu vodoyu vypyty
Prykroshchi na shcho denʹ do rejectors
Idete do shcho vy vykorystaly disbelieve
Idutʹ do tini trʹokh riznykh shchilʹnosti
Dosi, tse zabezpechuye ni coolness, ni zakhyst z tepla
Tse kydaye iskru taki velyki yak osobnyaky
Takyy zhovtyy yak kolir verblyudiv
Prykroshchi na shcho denʹ do rejectors
Shcho yavlyaye soboyu denʹ vony ne rozmovlyayutʹ
Ne podani vony dozvil pereprosyty
Prykroshchi na shcho denʹ do rejectors
Tse yavlyaye soboyu Denʹ Rishennya. My sklykaly vas ta poperedni heneratsiyi
Yakshcho vy mayete budʹ-yaki skhemy, idete vpered ta skhema
Prykroshchi na shcho denʹ do rejectors
spravedlyvyy otrymayutʹ nasolodu vid tini ta pruzhyn
Ta frukty shcho vony bazhayutʹ
Hostyatʹsya ta napiy happily v obmin na vashi pratsi
My takym chynom nahorodzhuyemo dobrochesnyy
Prykroshchi na shcho denʹ do rejectors
Hostyatʹsya ta polyublyayutʹ tymchasovo; vy ye vynuvati
Prykroshchi na shcho denʹ do rejectors
Koly vony rozpovidayutʹsya, "Klanyayutʹsya vnyz," vony ne klanyayutʹsya vnyz
Prykroshchi na shcho denʹ do rejectors
Kotryy Hadith, za vynyatkom tse, vony uphold
